product_name: Timbuk2 Element Water Resistant Jacket Sleeve - iPad
long_description: The Timbuk2 Element Water Resistant Jacket sleeve lets you take your iPad(R) to the beach or pool without worrying about rogue waves, obnoxious splashes or falling sand castles. Slim design fits all iPad models, adding a layer of water- and dust-resistant protection. Weatherproof port lets you access the headphone jack. Soft, faux-fur lining protects your iPad's sleek back. The Timbuk2 Element Water Resistant Jacket sleeve features a zippered pocket for accessories and a hand strap for easy gripping.
short_description: The Timbuk2 Element Water Resistant Jacket sleeve lets you take your iPad(R) to the beach or pool without worrying about rogue waves, obnoxious splashes or falling sand castles.
